title: High-complexity function refactoring
description: Reduced cyclomatic complexity in 3 critical CLI commands: ServiceOrchestrator.apply E(32)→B(7), check_deploy_command D(29)→C(11), validate_dashboard_command E(35)→B(8). Created DashboardValidator class, SLOMetricCollector class, extracted helper functions. Removed dead code. Average complexity now A (3.87). 470 tests passing.
